metadata.title: Procedure | Enterprise Technology Consultancy
metadata.description: AI Engineering, Software Engineering, Design, and AI Security services for enterprises.

services.label: What We Do
services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: From strategy to execution, we partner with you at every stage.

staffAug.title: Staff Augmentation
staffAug.description: Embed our engineers directly into your team. Scale up or down as needed.

endToEnd.title: End-to-End
endToEnd.description: We own the project from discovery to deployment. You stay focused on your business.

bot.title: Build-Operate-Transfer
bot.description: We build it, run it until it's stable, then transfer ownership to your team.

timeMaterial.title: Time & Material
timeMaterial.description: Flexible scope, pay for actual work. Best for evolving requirements.

fixedBid.title: Fixed Bid
fixedBid.description: Defined scope, agreed price. Best for well-specified projects.

about.label: About Us
about.title: Engineering teams
about.subtitle: you can rely on
about.description: We're a team of engineers who've built and scaled products at startups and enterprises alike. We partner with companies to solve hard technical problems — from AI systems that actually work in production to platforms that scale with your ambition.

security.label: Security & Compliance
security.title: Built on trust
security.description: Security isn't an afterthought — it's foundational to how we work. Enterprise-grade practices to protect your data.

soc2.title: SOC 2 Type II
soc2.description: Annual audits for security, availability, and confidentiality

encryption.title: Data Encryption
encryption.description: AES-256 at rest, TLS 1.3 in transit

gdpr.title: GDPR Ready
gdpr.description: Full compliance with EU data protection

accessControl.title: Access Control
accessControl.description: RBAC with audit logging and regular reviews

cta.title: Let's build something great
cta.description: Whether you need to ship faster, scale your AI, or secure your systems — we're ready to help. Book a call and let's talk.

footer.tagline: Engineering teams you can rely on. AI, software, design, and security — from Mumbai and San Francisco.

blog.label: Blog & Case Studies
blog.title: Insights from the
blog.description: Technical deep-dives, case studies, and lessons learned from building production systems.
blog.noPostsFound: No posts found for this category.

careers.label: Careers
careers.title: Build the future
careers.description: Join a team of engineers and designers solving hard problems for ambitious companies. Remote-first, impact-driven, and always learning.
careers.noRoleFits: Don't see a role that fits?
careers.noRoleFitsDescription: We're always looking for talented people. Send us your resume and tell us what you're passionate about.

engineering.title: Engineering Excellence
engineering.description: We obsess over code quality, performance, and reliability. Ship fast, but ship right.

partnership.title: Client Partnership
partnership.description: We embed with our clients, understanding their business deeply to deliver real impact.

learning.title: Continuous Learning
learning.description: The tech landscape evolves quickly. We stay ahead through constant exploration.

remote.title: Remote-First Culture
remote.description: Work from anywhere. We trust our team and optimize for output, not hours.

seniorAI.title: Senior AI Engineer
seniorAI.description: Build and deploy production AI systems for enterprise clients.

fullStack.title: Full Stack Engineer
fullStack.description: Work on modern web applications using React, Node.js, and cloud technologies.

designer.title: Product Designer
designer.description: Design intuitive user experiences for complex enterprise applications.

security.title: Security Engineer
security.description: Secure AI systems and implement robust security practices for clients.

contact.label: Contact Us
contact.title: Let's discuss
contact.description: Tell us about your project and we'll get back to you within 24 hours.

form.name: Name
form.projectDescriptionPlaceholder: Tell us about your project, goals, and any specific requirements...

success.title: Thanks for reaching out!
success.message: We've received your message and will get back to you within 24 hours.

alternative.preferToTalk: Prefer to talk? Book a call directly.

ai-engineering.label: AI Engineering
ai-engineering.tagline: We make AI work in production
ai-engineering.description: Most AI projects die between demo and deployment. We build the infrastructure, pipelines, and integrations that make AI systems reliable at scale.

software.label: Software Engineering
software.tagline: Software built for the next decade
software.description: We engineer systems designed for change. Clean architecture, pragmatic testing, and infrastructure that accelerates your team instead of slowing it down.

design.label: Design
design.description: We don't design for awards. We design interfaces that reduce friction, increase adoption, and move the metrics your business cares about.

ai-security.label: AI Security
ai-security.tagline: Secure your AI before others exploit it
ai-security.description: AI systems have attack surfaces your security team hasn't seen. We find the vulnerabilities—prompt injection, data extraction, adversarial attacks—before bad actors do.

painPoints.headline: Sound familiar?
ai-engineering: Our AI demo works great, but we can't get it to production
Models keep breaking and we don't know why
Data pipelines are a mess of scripts and cron jobs
We're stuck on prototypes while competitors ship
software: Every new feature takes longer than the last
We're afraid to touch legacy code
Our infrastructure can't keep up with growth
design: Users abandon our product but we don't know why
Design and engineering are constantly misaligned
We ship features nobody asked for
Our app feels dated compared to competitors
ai-security: We deployed AI but haven't tested for attacks
Our security team doesn't understand AI risks
We're not sure what data our models leak
Compliance is asking questions we can't answer
